Desc.entry: Sheffield Health and Social Care, Community Learning Disability Team provides help and advice regarding the health needs of adults with a learning disability, plus a range of specialist assessments and therapies. The teams consist of occupational therapists, psychologists, speech and language therapists, physiotherapists, social workers and community nurses. Works with individuals and their carers and can be contacted direct for information and advice. Referral is acceptable from any source with the exception of a referral to psychiatry, which must be from a GP. Referral must be on a contact assessment form. Assistance will be given to anyone who has difficulties completing the form.
